attributes.action: We call upon HM Government to declare the Referendum result null and void
attributes.additional_details:
1.Unsubstantiated statements and promises regarding the amount of money that would be available to plough into the NHS if we left the EU.
2. Unsubstantiated and unachievable statements and promises regarding their ability to control immigration if we left the EU.
attributes.background: We call upon HM Government to declare the Referendum result null and void due to misleading & unsubstantiated Brexit campaign practices, statements and promises aimed at influencing the outcome. We believe this constitutes electoral fraud designed to skew the results requiring a 2nd referendum.
